data.title: Techtron Global Services (P) Ltd. on LinkedIn: Zakya Review
data.meta_description:
Exploring Zakya from Zoho
Read the review: https://zurl.co/kT8X
data.text:
Efficient sales order management is a critical aspect of running a successful business. For small businesses and sales teams, the ability to process orders quickly and accurately can significantly impact customer satisfaction and overall business performance. Zoho Inventory has long been a trusted solution for inventory management, providing businesses with powerful tools to streamline their operations. In this blog post, we will explore the features and benefits of the Sales Order Entry App for Zoho Inventory, demonstrating how it can help small businesses and sales teams improve efficiency and boost productivity. Whether you're a small business owner looking to streamline your sales processes or a sales team member aiming to reduce errors and save time, this app has something to offer. https://lnkd.in/g8f9iG8f #Growmax #Zoho #ZohoInventory #ZohoAnalytics #SalesStrategy #DataIntegration #BusinessGrowth #SalesApp #MobileAccess #SmallBusiness #DigitalTransformation #ZohoIntegration #SalesAutomation #B2Bsales #foodandbeverage #FMCG #USA

Case study: All-in-one HubSpot CRM for a major e-commerce customer support platform â¤µï¸ eDesk is a customer support solution provider helping online retailers deliver extraordinary customer service everywhere they sell. The eDesk platform powers 50 million+ conversations every month, resulting in billions of dollars of e-commerce transactions every year. Theyâ€™d implemented HubSpot 4.5 years previously, but it wasnâ€™t tailored to their business needs. Functions and capabilities were limited, and workflows were getting more and more complicated. It was costing their employees time, not saving it! We turned things around, shaping an intuitive, user-friendly CRM that cut workflows by 75% for less effort and better results. Read the full case study here: https://bit.ly/3FBv96Z

The article "It's Not Business, It's Personal: The Lines Between B2B and B2C Are Blurring" by Future Commerce provides insights into the ever-evolving landscape of #commerce. As professionals in this dynamic field, it's essential to stay ahead of these trends. ğŸŒ The Blurring Lines: Traditionally, we've separated #B2B (Business-to-Business) and #B2C (Business-to-Consumer) commerce, but this article underscores how these boundaries are rapidly disappearing. The reasons are manifold, from changing consumer behaviors to advancements in #technology. ğŸ“ˆ Consumerization of B2B: We're witnessing a shift where B2B customers are demanding more personalized and convenient experiences, similar to their B2C interactions. Supply chain businesses need to adapt by focusing on user-centric design and customer journeys. ğŸ”— Omnichannel Integration: A central theme here is the need for seamless #omnichannel #integration. Whether it's #ecommerce, mobile apps, or in-person experiences, businesses must offer a cohesive and unified experience across all touchpoints for end-to-end collaborative visibility. ğŸ“± Digital Transformation: COVID-19 accelerated digital transformation, and this article highlights how it's reshaping both B2B and B2C spaces. Companies investing in technology are poised to lead the way in this new landscape. ğŸ’¡ Key Takeaway for Professionals: In today's commerce landscape, it's crucial for professionals like us to think beyond traditional categories. We must anticipate and meet the evolving expectations of our customers, whether they're businesses or consumers. #Adaptability and #innovation will be our greatest assets. Let's continue to be agile, learn, and thrive in this exciting era of commerce! ğŸ’ª #CommerceEvolution #B2B #B2C #DigitalTransformation #SupplyChainTechnology #SupplyChain

Is Zoho Commerce the game-changer your business needs in 2024? ğŸ‘€ In our latest blog post, we dive deep into the ins and outs of Zoho Commerce to help you decide if it's the right fit for your business. With an ever-growing list of features and a reputation for innovation, Zoho Commerce promises a lot. But does it deliver? We've explored everything from ease of use to pricing, and customer support to integrations. Our thorough review aims to provide you with all the insights you need to make an informed decision ğŸ‘‡ https://lnkd.in/gxDa_aiE What features do you value most in an ecommerce platform? Share your thoughts in the comments ğŸ’¡ #ecommerce #zohocommerce #zoho #onlinebusiness #tech
